description: A great live show from Morrissey, not only is the concert on his home turf, it's also on his birthday. Morrissey displays all of the charm and wit that have fueled his popularity. Watch as he alternately taunts and encourages the ...

name: Morrissey: Who Put the M in Manchester

original_info.id: Morrissey: Who Put the "M" in Manchester_2004
original_info.name: Morrissey: Who Put the "M" in Manchester

review.name: wow
review.reviewBody: I have purchased and seen many Morrissey videos and this is definitely the best I have seen. If you love the man's music and hope to see a DVD in which the true concert experience is captured, this is your movie. I have been lucky enough to see Morrissey live twice and this DVD is almost as good. The performance is incredible and, the only reason I would rate a live performance as better is because the man himself is in the same room. very worth your money and time. The set list contains songs that not only reflect Morrissey's huge catalog, but also show off his incredible vocals. The band sounds great, as always. The crowd is enthusiastic and the videography is superb. A DVD that is a must in any true Morrissey fan's library. A+++++ all the way!
